hero.title: Managing your condo
hero.titleHighlight: doesn't have to be a headache anymore
hero.subtitle: The tool that helps you collect fees, keep neighbors informed, and keep your accounts in order. Simple, as it should be.

problems.title: We know how hard it is
problems.subtitle: Managing a condo can be exhausting. We make it easier.

payments.solution: Neighbors pay online and you see everything instantly

meetings.solution: Send announcements and receive responses from home

communication.solution: Automatic notifications that actually arrive and get read

spreadsheets.solution: A simple system that does the calculations for you

benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.title: Everything you need, nothing you don't

paperwork.title: Forget the paperwork
paperwork.description: Everything in one place: fees, payments, announcements. No Excel sheets or lost folders.

collections.title: Collect without chasing anyone
collections.description: Neighbors receive automatic reminders and can pay from their phone.

informed.title: Everyone informed
informed.description: Announcements, notices, and documents go directly to each resident's phone.

transparency.title: Clear accounts
transparency.description: Each neighbor sees their payments, receipts, and account status whenever they want, without calling you.

register.title: Register your condo
register.description: In less than 5 minutes you're all set

invite.title: Invite the neighbors
invite.description: They get a link and that's it, they're in

manage.title: Start managing
manage.description: Generate fees, receive payments, send notices

cta.title: Ready to simplify your life?
cta.subtitle: Join the administrators who already stopped suffering with paperwork and late payments.

pricing.label: For condo management companies
pricing.title: Start managing with our platform
pricing.subtitle: We design customized solutions for each management company. Schedule a meeting to learn about your business and create a plan that fits your needs.

schedule.title: Schedule a meeting
schedule.description: Let's talk about your management company and specific needs

negotiate.title: We negotiate the price
negotiate.description: We create a personalized plan based on the size of your operation

start.title: Start operating
start.description: Once agreed, we give you full access to the platform

pricing.helpText: and we'll help you understand how it works

footer.description: The easiest way to manage your condo.

unified.signUpSubtitle: Sign up for free and start managing your condo in minutes. No credit card required.

joinCondominium.title: Join a Condominium

step3.title: Request submitted!
step3.message: Your request has been submitted. You will be notified when the administrator reviews it.

errors.profileIncompleteMessage:
To submit an access request, we need to verify your identity. Please complete the following information in your profile:

• Phone number (with area code)
• Identity document (type and number)

This only takes a moment and is required so the administrator can verify your request.
errors.alreadyHasOwnership: You already have an active ownership for this unit
errors.alreadyHasPendingRequest: You already have a pending request for this unit
errors.unitNotInCondominium: The unit does not belong to this condominium

statusMessages.rejected: Your request was rejected by the administrator.

actions.deactivateConfirm: Do you want to deactivate this company?

companySection.title: Company Information
companySection.description: Enter the legal identification data of the management company, including its commercial name, legal name and tax ID

contactSection.title: Contact Information

addressSection.title: Location
addressSection.description: Indicate the geographic location and physical address of the management company's offices

fields.name: Commercial Name
fields.nameDescription: The name by which the management company is publicly known. It will appear on documents and communications with residents
fields.legalNameDescription: Full legal name as it appears in the commercial registry. Include the company designation (Inc., LLC, etc.)
fields.taxIdDescription: Tax identification number of the management company. Select the type and then enter the number without dashes
fields.emailDescription: Main email address for receiving official communications and system notifications
fields.phoneDescription: Main phone number of the management company. Residents will be able to use this number for contact
fields.websiteDescription: Management company website (optional). If you don't have a website, leave this field empty
fields.addressPlaceholder: Main Ave, Tower Building, Floor 5, Office 5-A
fields.addressDescription: Complete physical address of the management company's offices, including references if necessary
fields.locationDescription: Select the country, state and city where the management company's offices are located
fields.adminEmailDescription: This will be the administrator's login email

confirmation.title: Confirm Creation
confirmation.description: Review the details before creating the management company
confirmation.warning: An email will be sent to the administrator with access instructions

form.emailNotSent: The company was created but the invitation email could not be sent. You can resend the invitation from the companies list.

adminValidation.emailExists: This email is already registered. Use the 'Use existing user' option to select this user
adminValidation.userInactive: This user is inactive and cannot be used as an administrator

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.noActiveSubscriptionDescription: This management company does not have an active subscription. Create a new subscription to enable platform access.

sections.pricingDescription: The suggested price is automatically calculated based on the condominiums and units of the management company
sections.basicInfoDescription: Configure the subscription name and billing cycle
sections.datesDescription: Define start, end, and renewal dates
sections.limitsDescription: Set usage limits for this subscription (leave empty = unlimited)
sections.featuresDescription: Select the features included in this subscription
sections.finalPriceDescription: Set the subscription price. You can use the suggested value or set a different amount
sections.pricingNotesDescription: Additional information about the price or discounts applied

pricing.condominiumsDescription: Number of active condominiums registered in the management company
pricing.unitsDescription: Sum of all units (apartments, houses, stores) from all condominiums
pricing.usersDescription: Number of management company staff users (managers, accountants, assistants). Does not include residents.
pricing.error: Could not calculate price. Please try again.

noRateConfigured.title: No subscription rates configured
noRateConfigured.description: To create subscriptions, at least one active rate must exist in the system.
noRateConfigured.instruction: Go to Settings → Subscription Rates to create a rate before continuing.

pricing.formulaDescription: The price is calculated by adding the cost per condominiums, units, and active users, multiplied by the billing cycle months:
pricing.formulaDetail: [(Condominiums × Rate) + (Units × Rate) + (Users × Rate)] × Months - Discounts = Final Price

formulaTooltip.title: Formula explanation
formulaTooltip.condominiumsDesc: Number of active condominiums assigned to this management company
formulaTooltip.condominiumRateDesc: Monthly amount charged per managed condominium
formulaTooltip.unitsDesc: Total units (apartments, houses, stores) from all buildings of all condominiums
formulaTooltip.unitRateDesc: Monthly amount charged per registered unit
formulaTooltip.usersDesc: Active management company staff users (managers, accountants, assistants)
formulaTooltip.userRateDesc: Monthly amount charged per active staff user
formulaTooltip.monthsDesc: Number of months in the billing cycle (1 for monthly, 12 for annual). The monthly base price is multiplied by this number
formulaTooltip.discountDesc: Reduction applied to the total price (percentage or fixed amount). Discounts are applied after multiplying by months

pricing.rateDescription: Rates are obtained from the active rate system
pricing.resetNoRates: You must first configure subscription rates before calculating the price

fields.subscriptionNameDescription: Descriptive name to identify this subscription

rate.label: Subscription Rate
rate.description: Specific rate selected to calculate the price
rate.descriptionDefault: No selection - tiered pricing based on condominium count will be used

fields.billingCycleDescription: Frequency at which the subscription will be billed
fields.basePriceDescription: Amount to charge per billing cycle
fields.basePriceModified: You have modified the suggested price
fields.pricingNotesPlaceholder: e.g. Special discount for frequent customer, launch promotion...
fields.statusDescription: Status with which the subscription will be created
fields.endDateCalculatedDescription: The end date is automatically calculated based on the selected billing cycle
fields.endDateAutoCalculated: Automatically calculated based on billing cycle
fields.trialEndsAtDescription: Date when the trial period ends
fields.autoRenewDescription: The subscription will automatically renew at the end of the period
fields.maxUnitsDescription: Maximum number of units (apartments, houses, premises) across all condominiums
fields.maxUsersDescription: Maximum number of management company staff users (managers, accountants, assistants, etc.). Does not include residents.
fields.notesDescription: Additional information or comments about this subscription

confirmation.title: Confirm Subscription
confirmation.description: Review the data before creating the subscription

basePrice.min: Base price must be greater than 0.

trialEndsAt.required: Trial end date is required when status is Trial.

maxCondominiums.min: Maximum condominiums must be greater than 0.

maxUnits.min: Maximum units must be greater than 0.

maxUsers.min: Maximum users must be greater than 0.

maxStorageGb.min: Maximum storage must be greater than 0.

discount.maxPercentage: Percentage discount cannot be greater than 100%.
discount.maxFixed: Fixed discount cannot be greater than the calculated price.

validation.integer: This field only accepts positive integers.

cancel.title: Cancel Subscription
cancel.warning: You are about to cancel the subscription {name}. This action will disable automatic renewal and mark the subscription as cancelled.
cancel.emailNotice: An email notification will be sent to the main superuser, the company email, and the primary administrators.
cancel.passwordDescription: To confirm this sensitive action, enter your current password.

replace.title: Replace Active Subscription
replace.warning: This management company already has an active subscription. If you continue, the current subscription will be cancelled and replaced with the new one.
replace.emailNotice: Email notifications will be sent regarding the cancellation of the current subscription and the creation of the new subscription.
replace.passwordDescription: To confirm the subscription replacement, enter your current password.
replace.autoReason: Subscription replaced with a new one

history.title: Subscription History

locationSection.title: Location
locationSection.description: Geographic location and address of the condominium

fields.name: Condominium Name
fields.codeDescription: Unique identification code for the condominium
fields.addressPlaceholder: Example: Parish, Municipality, Urbanization, Postal Code, Street
fields.phoneDescription: Contact phone number for the condominium

buildings.title: Condominium buildings
buildings.subtitle: Add the buildings that make up the condominium
buildings.removeConfirm: Remove this building and its units?
buildings.emptyDescription: Add at least one building to continue
buildings.floorsInteger: Number of floors must be a whole number
buildings.existingUnitsWarning: This building has {count} units. Generating new ones will replace them.

bulkBuildings.title: Generate buildings
bulkBuildings.defaultFloorsHint: Will be applied to all generated buildings (optional)
bulkBuildings.codeConfigHint: Generate a unique code for each building. Useful for identifying buildings in reports and official documents. If not enabled, codes can be assigned manually later.
bulkBuildings.generateUnitsHint: Automatically generate units (apartments/commercial spaces) for each building. Configure how many units per floor, the naming pattern, and the characteristics per floor group.
bulkBuildings.floorsRequiredForUnits: Floors count is required to generate units

units.title: Units per building
units.subtitle: Add units to each building
units.emptyDescription: Add at least one unit per building
units.label: units

review.title: Final review
review.subtitle: Verify all information before creating the condominium

submission.partialError: Some items could not be created

bulk.title: Generate units
bulk.defaultValuesHint: These values will be applied as defaults to all generated units. You can edit them individually later in the Units step.
bulk.floorRangeError: Ending floor must be greater than or equal to starting floor
bulk.unitsPerFloorRequired: Number of units per floor is required
bulk.maxLetterUnits: Letter pattern supports a maximum of 26 units per floor
bulk.floorGroupsHint: Define different characteristics for each floor range. For example: floors 1-3 with 2 bedrooms and floors 4-10 with 3 bedrooms. Ranges must not overlap.
bulk.floorGroupRequired: At least one floor group is required
bulk.aliquotHint: The aliquot percentage determines what proportion of the condominium's common expenses each unit must pay. The sum of all aliquots in a building must equal 100%.
bulk.aliquotByAreaHint: Units with larger area pay a higher percentage. Calculated as: (unit area / total area) × 100. Requires all floor groups to have the area field defined.
bulk.aliquotByAreaMissingArea: All floor groups must have the area (m²) field to calculate proportional aliquot
bulk.aliquotCustomHint: Define a fixed percentage per floor group

csv.title: Import units from CSV
csv.instructionsDesc: The file must be CSV (comma or semicolon separated). The first row can be a header (auto-detected). Only the unitNumber column is required.
csv.notes: Tip: You can use Excel or Google Sheets to create the file and export it as CSV. Empty fields are ignored.

paymentConcepts.title: Payment Concepts
paymentConcepts.subtitle: Fee types configured for the condominium
paymentConcepts.emptyDescription: Payment concepts define the types of fees for the condominium

wizard.title: Create Payment Concept
wizard.subtitle: Configure a new payment concept for the condominium

basicInfo.description: Define the basic information for the payment concept
basicInfo.name: Name
basicInfo.isRecurringHint: Will be generated automatically based on the selected period

tooltips.name: Unique name that identifies this payment concept. E.g.: Monthly Maintenance Fee
tooltips.description: Detailed concept description. Will be shown to residents on their account statements
tooltips.type: Concept category. Determines how it is classified in financial reports
tooltips.currency: Currency in which charges for this concept will be issued
tooltips.recurrencePeriod: Frequency at which charges will be automatically generated

chargeConfig.description: Configure dates, partial payments, and surcharges
chargeConfig.interestHint: Apply automatic interest on overdue debts

tooltips.issueDay: Day of the month (1-28) when charges are automatically generated
tooltips.dueDay: Day of the month (1-28) when payment is due. Surcharges apply after this date
tooltips.latePaymentType: Type of penalty applied when payment is made after the due date
tooltips.latePaymentValue: Surcharge value: percentage on balance or fixed additional amount
tooltips.graceDays: Additional days after due date before surcharge is applied
tooltips.earlyPaymentType: Type of discount granted for paying before the due date
tooltips.earlyPaymentValue: Discount value: percentage on amount or fixed discount
tooltips.daysBeforeDue: Number of days before due date when the discount applies
tooltips.interestType: Simple: calculated on original amount. Compound: calculated on accumulated balance
tooltips.interestRate: Interest rate applied to overdue balance per calculation period
tooltips.interestCalculationPeriod: Frequency at which interest is calculated and accumulated on the debt
tooltips.interestGraceDays: Days after due date before interest starts being calculated

chargeConfig.dueDayNextMonthHint: The due day is before the issue day. The due date will fall in the month after the billing period.

assignments.description: Define how charges are distributed among units
assignments.methodAliquotHint: The total amount is distributed proportionally based on each unit's aliquot percentage
assignments.methodEqualSplitHint: The total amount is divided equally among all units
assignments.methodFixedHint: Each unit pays exactly this amount
assignments.required: At least one assignment is required
assignments.currentAssignmentsTooltip: Each assignment defines who gets charged and how the amount is calculated. For example: if you assign 'Tower A' with method 'By Aliquot' and amount $100,000, the system will distribute that $100,000 among all units in Tower A proportionally based on their aliquot percentage. You can add multiple assignments with different scopes and amounts.
assignments.assignmentDescription_condominium_by_ali: {amount} distributed among all condominium units, proportional to their aliquot
assignments.assignmentDescription_condominium_equal_: {amount} divided equally among all condominium units
assignments.assignmentDescription_building_by_aliquo: {amount} distributed among units in {target}, proportional to their aliquot
assignments.assignmentDescription_unit_fixed_per_uni: Each of the {count} selected units pays {amount}

tooltips.scope: Determines who this charge applies to: the entire condominium, a specific building, or individual units
tooltips.building: Select the buildings whose residents will receive this charge. You can select multiple.
tooltips.distributionMethod: By Aliquot: proportional to each unit's percentage. Equal Split: divided equally. Fixed: each unit pays this exact amount
tooltips.amount: Total amount to distribute among units based on the selected method. For fixed amount, each unit pays this value

calculator.noPairRate: No rate registered for this currency pair

accept.termsCheckbox: I have read and accept the

accept.expiredHelp: Contact the administrator to request a new acceptance link.

errors.invalid: The acceptance link is not valid or has already been used.
errors.failed: Error accepting the subscription. Please try again.
errors.mustAcceptTerms: You must accept the terms and conditions to continue.
errors.mustBeLoggedIn: You must log in to accept this subscription.
errors.userNotFound: No account found with this email address.

apiErrors.ALREADY_EXISTS: A record with this value already exists
apiErrors.ALREADY_EXISTS.Condominium.email: A condominium with this email already exists
apiErrors.ALREADY_EXISTS.Condominium.code: A condominium with this code already exists
apiErrors.ALREADY_EXISTS.Condominium.name: A condominium with this name already exists
apiErrors.ALREADY_EXISTS.Building.name: A building with this name already exists
apiErrors.ALREADY_EXISTS.Building.code: A building with this code already exists
apiErrors.ALREADY_EXISTS.Unit.unitNumber: A unit with this number already exists
apiErrors.ALREADY_EXISTS.User.email: A user with this email already exists
apiErrors.VALIDATION_ERROR: Validation error in the submitted data
apiErrors.DUPLICATE_KEY: A record with this value already exists
apiErrors.FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to perform this action
apiErrors.TOKEN_EXPIRED: Session expired. Please sign in again
apiErrors.INTERNAL_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later
apiErrors.RATE_LIMITED: Too many requests. Please try again later
apiErrors.FOREIGN_KEY_VIOLATION: Cannot perform the operation: related records exist
apiErrors.SUBSCRIPTION_LIMIT_REACHED.condominium: You have reached the condominium limit for your subscription ({currentCount}/{maxAllowed})
apiErrors.SUBSCRIPTION_LIMIT_REACHED.unit: You have reached the unit limit for your subscription ({currentCount}/{maxAllowed}). You tried to add {requested}
apiErrors.NO_ACTIVE_SUBSCRIPTION: Your management company does not have an active subscription
